job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, and deploy AI driven platform capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the creation and implementation of AI-driven functionalities, which falls under the umbrella of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze available data for training machine learning models or fine-tuning LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions training ML models and fine-tuning LLMs, which are core modeling activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow
job_tasks.justification: Implementing AI capabilities as services or agentic flows using frameworks points to software development to integrate these models into a larger system.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions
job_tasks.justification: Translating requirements into scalable solutions and collaborating with stakeholders are key aspects of software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing deployed AI capabilities for performance in demanding environments is a direct indication of MLOps or operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: transforming the banking industry with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled customer experiences
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business context and strategic goals of transforming the banking industry.

job_tasks.phrase: create innovative AI solutions that will transform the banking landscape
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the goal of applying AI to transform the banking landscape, showing an alignment with business objectives.
While not extensive, analyzing data is a precursor to modeling and can be considered a foundational data engineering task.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders
Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams
passionate about exploring cutting-edge advancements in AI and software engineering

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions fine-tuning LLMs and leveraging frameworks for agentic flows, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The emphasis on designing and deploying AI-driven platform capabilities, combined with the focus on LLMs, strongly supports this classification.
